review: We use our Amazon Fire TV Sticks for listening to music a lot. Great for putting on a playlist as we clean or just sit around the house. The only problem I seem to have is when I create a new playlist, add Prime Music to my cloud and purchase new albums. They don't show up in my music lists on Amazon Fire TV Stick. I am sure there is a solution to this problem; I will keep trying to figure it out. Watching Amazon Prime Instant Video is easy and works well.
author: Barry Ammons
